about_the_game:
Dive into the immersive world of SolidRiver, a survival RPG set in a procedurally-generated medieval universe. Here, every decision shapes the storyline and unfolds in a cross-platform, multiplayer setting.

Craft your Legacy


Within SolidRiver's extensive crafting system, the creative possibilities are endless. From simple survival gear to elaborate armors and weaponry, craft a variety of items using the resources you collect. Your ingenuity defines your survival and dominance.

Limitless Building System


Experience limitless creativity with SolidRiver's No-Grid Building System. Freed from grid constraints, construct unique buildings of unprecedented detail. From tiny hamlets to bustling cities or towering castles, create a world that mirrors your vision.

You are not alone


Engage with SolidRiver's diverse AI villagers, each bursting with unique personalities and stories. Your interactions influence their lives and the vibrant community within the game, adding another layer of depth to the experience.

Living Quests


Enjoy the thrill of an adaptive quest system that evolves based on your decisions. The choices you make can change the trajectory of quests, providing a fresh, dynamic storyline for every playthrough.

Cross-Plattform


Experience the excitement of SolidRiver's cross-platform multiplayer feature. Join forces with friends or forge new alliances with players worldwide. Engage in epic battles, or trade goods in a shared world that's constantly evolving.

Explore a Massive World


Venture into a colossal, procedurally-generated world. Each new game of SolidRiver offers a unique landscape filled with realistic terrains, diverse ecosystems, and hidden treasures, providing endless exploration opportunities.

The Journey is wating for you


SolidRiver combines the excitement of a survival RPG with the charm of a medieval setting. With extensive crafting, a no-grid building system, dynamic villager interactions, adaptive quests, and seamless multiplayer gameplay, it's a world shaped by your decisions. Embark on this grand adventure across platforms and uncover the limitless narrative possibilities that SolidRiver offers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 10XX or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Thrive in a realistic environment where crafting, building, and survival meet the intrigue of medieval life. Construct inspiring structures and cultivate a community of loyal villagers. Your ingenuity is your strength. Your will is your weapon.
